article_title: Why this doctor posted his medical history online for anyone to see – Naked Security
article_text: John Zorabedian is a blogger, copywriter and editor at Sophos. He has a background in journalism, writing about technology, business, politics and culture. He lives and works in the Boston area.

article_metadata.description: One doctor posted his entire medical history online, and he wants others to do the same.

og.description: Would you want anyone and everyone to be able to see all your medical records? One doctor posted his entire medical history online, and he wants others to do the same.
og.title: Why this doctor posted his medical history online for anyone to see
